languages.text: "Я раскрыл схему, в которой замешаны все трое. Ее координирует Мастер вокса, которая хоронит обличающие факты о пустотниках в недрах архивов. Янрис Данрок и Равор закрывают глаза на нечистоплотность новых рекрутов и распределяют поступившую в их распоряжение рабочую силу".

traits.locale_text:
"Я раскрыл схему, в которой замешаны все трое. Ее координирует вокс-мастер — через зашифрованные вокс-каналы. Она передает сообщения о розыске
Янрису Данроку. Он же фальсифицирует документы и распределяет на службу — на этом корабле".

languages.text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."
languages.original_text: "Я раскрыл схему, в которой замешаны все трое. Ее координирует Мастер вокса, которая хоронит обличающие факты о пустотниках в недрах архивов. Янрис Данрок и Равор закрывают глаза на нечистоплотность новых рекрутов и распределяют поступившую в их распоряжение рабочую силу".

traits.locale_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidfarers on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

"I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidfarers on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

"I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidfarers on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

"I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

"I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

languages.text: 「私は、この三名すべてが関与する陰謀を突き止めました。主導しているのはヴォクス・マスターで、船内のヴォイズマンに関する不都合な事実を資料庫の奥深くに隠蔽しています。ジャンリス・ダンロックとラヴォアは、新たに採用された者たちの汚れた過去を見て見ぬふりをし、手に入れた労働力を分配しているのです」
languages.original_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、この三名すべてが関与する陰謀を突き止めました。主導しているのはヴォクス・マスターで、船内のヴォイズマンに関する不都合な事実を資料庫の奥深くに隠蔽しています。ジャンリス・ダンロックとラヴォアは、新たに採用された者たちの汚れた過去を見て見ぬふりをし、手に入れた労働力を分配しているのです」

languages.text: "Ancak üçünün de dâhil olduğu bir entrikayı ortaya çıkardım. Bu entrikanın başında, geminizdeki uçsuz erlerine ilişkin gerçekleri arşivin derinliklerine gömen Voks Üstadı bulunuyor. Janris Danrok ve Ravor ise yeni gelenlerin kirli geçmişini görmezden gelerek ellerine geçen iş gücünü aralarında paylaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

traits.locale_text: "Lakin üçünün de dâhil olduğu bir entrikayı ortaya çıkarmış durumdayım. Bu entrikanın başında, geminizdeki uçsuz erlerine ilişkin gerçekleri arşivin derinliklerine gömen Voks Üstadı yer alıyor. Janris Danrok ve Ravor ise yeni gelenlerin kirli geçmişini görmezden gelerek ellerine geçen iş gücünü aralarında paylaşıyorlar."

languages.text: «He descubierto una conspiración en la que participan los tres. La coordina la maestra de vocos, que entierra los datos incriminatorios contra infantes del vacío de su nave en las profundidades de los archivos. Janris Danrok y Ravor pasan intencionadamente por alto el sórdido pasado de los nuevos reclutas y se reparten los trabajadores que entran a su servicio».
languages.original_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

traits.locale_text: «He descubierto una conspiración en la que participan los tres. La coordina la maestra de vocos, que entierra los datos incriminatorios contra infantes del vacío de su nave en las profundidades de los archivos. Janris Danrok y Ravor pasan intencionadamente por alto el sórdido pasado de los nuevos reclutas y se reparten los trabajadores que entran a su servicio».

languages.text: “我发现了一个阴谋，他们三个全都参与了这个阴谋。这件事情是由音阵大师负责协调的，她把所有船员的犯罪档案都埋藏在了资料库深处。至于詹里斯·丹罗克与雷沃，他们对新船员罪恶的过去视而不见，直接把他们当做劳动力使用。”
languages.original_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

traits.locale_text: “我发现了一个阴谋，他们三个全都参与了这个阴谋。这件事情是由音阵大师负责协调的，她把所有船员的犯罪档案都埋藏在了资料库深处。至于詹里斯·丹罗克与雷沃，他们对新船员罪恶的过去视而不见，直接把他们当做劳动力使用。”

languages.text: « J'ai découvert une machination orchestrée par ces trois personnes. La coordination est assurée par la maîtresse-vox, qui enterre les données compromettantes concernant des cosmomarins de votre équipage dans des strates d'archives. Janris Danrok et Ravor ignorent sciemment le passé sordide de leurs nouvelles recrues et se répartissent la main-d'œuvre ainsi embauchée. »
languages.original_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai découvert une machination orchestrée par ces trois personnes. La coordination est assurée par la maîtresse-vox, qui enterre les données compromettantes concernant des cosmomarins de votre équipage dans des strates d'archives. Janris Danrok et Ravor ignorent sciemment le passé sordide de leurs nouvelles recrues et se répartissent la main-d'œuvre ainsi embauchée. »

languages.text: "Ich habe eine Intrige aufgedeckt, an der alle drei beteiligt sind. Sie wird von der Voxmeisterin koordiniert, die belastendes Material gegen Raumfahrer auf Eurem Schiff in den Tiefen der Archive verwahrt. Janris Danrok und Ravor scheren sich nicht um die verkommene Vergangenheit neuer Rekruten und teilen die Arbeitskräfte auf, die in ihren Besitz gelangt sind."
languages.original_text: "I have uncovered a scheme involving all three of them. It is coordinated by the Vox Master, who buries incriminating facts about voidsmen on your ship in the depths of the archives. Janris Danrok and Ravor turn a blind eye to the sordid pasts of the new recruits and divvy up the workforce that has come into their possession."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe eine Intrige aufgedeckt, an der alle drei beteiligt sind. Sie wird von der Voxmeisterin koordiniert, die belastendes Material gegen Raumfahrer auf Eurem Schiff in den Tiefen der Archive verwahrt. Janris Danrok und Ravor scheren sich nicht um die verkommene Vergangenheit neuer Rekruten und teilen die Arbeitskräfte auf, die in ihren Besitz gelangt sind."
